mean_cn: n. 精神病，精神错乱，精神变态
mean_en: a very serious mental illness that makes you behave strangely or believe things that are not true
word_etyma: psych灵魂+osis病症→精神病,精神变态
short_phrase: His psychosis causes him to behave strangely.
sentence: He was always threatening to do crazy things because of his psychosis.
sentence_trans: 因为精神错乱，他经常威胁着做出疯狂的举动。
